nodes.text: The compound of Darth Vengean was a huge complex within the Sith Sanctum, where the strongest warriors trained and followed the orders of their master.

During his time as a Dark Councilor, Darth Vengean owned a compound where he gathered the strongest warriors of the reconstituted Sith Empire and fulfilled his duties as the head of the Sphere of Military Offense. The compound had various rooms and corridors, as well as holding cells and a room with torture devices. However the most important locations where large areas where Vengean's followers could train their abilities, and a room where Vengean himself and his Sith could discuss about their goals and enemies.
